Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(lightbox\): fix pinch zoom and pan not working after double-tap

- Switch pinch to incremental approach \(update lastPinchDist each frame\)
  so pinch-in/out responds continuously instead of drifting from start
- Add touchAction: none to Dialog.Content so browser doesn''t intercept
  pinch gestures before they reach the native listeners
- Clear isPanning on double-tap to keep gesture state clean
- Pan correctly arms on first touch after double-tap zoom
